Sentencas: The performance of solid oxide fuel cells, especially on the air side, degrades very rapidly when chromia forming alloys are used as interconnects in contact with electrodes.
Titulo: Interaction between chromia forming alloy interconnects and air electrode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effect of chromia forming alloys on the performance of doped LaMnO3 air electrode has been studied at the current fuel cell operating temperatures in the vicinity of 900-1000 degrees C. Interactions between a chromium-rich allay and doped LaMnO, were studied during testing of fuel cell stacks as well as in specially designed electrochemical experiments.
Titulo: Interaction between chromia forming alloy interconnects and air electrode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: On completion of these experiments interconnect/electrode and electrode/ electrolyte interfaces as well as interconnect, electrode and electrolyte materials were examined with scanning electron microscopy (SEM)/energy dispersive X-ray spectroscopy (EDS), X-ray diffraction (XRD) and optical microscopy.
Titulo: Interaction between chromia forming alloy interconnects and air electrode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A mechanism for cell performance degradation based on these observations has been proposed.
Titulo: Interaction between chromia forming alloy interconnects and air electrode of solid oxide fuel cells
